author: Dylan Haas
title: Buy a year of Masterclass and get a free year to gift to a friend
description: TL;DR: As of March 30, when you buy an annual membership ($180) to MasterClass, you'll get a second one free of charge to gift to somebody else. If there was ever a time to take up a new hobby, it's now — we are stuck indoors after all (at least we should be;…
content:
TL;DR: As of March 30, when you buy an annual membership ($180) to MasterClass, you'll get a second one free of charge to gift to somebody else.
If there was ever a time to take up a new hobby, it's now we are stuck indoors after all (at least we should be; … [+1263 chars]
